original_text: Then Jesus turned round. He saw that they were following him. He asked them, ‘What do you want?’ They said, ‘Rabbi (which means “Teacher”), where are you staying?’
korean_text: 예수께서 돌이켜 그 따르는 것을 보시고 물어 이르시되 무엇을 구하느냐 이르되 랍비여 어디 계시오니이까 하니 (랍비는 번역하면 선생이라)

sentences.original_text: He saw that they were following him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서는 그들이 자신을 따르고 있음을 보셨다.

sentences.original_text: He asked them, 'What do you want?'
